thread.title: Shaking Up Summer with Dean Tucker and a Fresh Take on Wellness
thread.title_full: Shaking Up Summer with Dean Tucker and a Fresh Take on Wellness

author: The Inertia
title: Shaking Up Summer with Dean Tucker and a Fresh Take on Wellness
text:
Photos: The Inertia
Editor’s Note: This feature is presented by our partners at Isopure .
In this episode of the Isopure “Shake Up Summer” series, creator Dean Tucker enhances his wellness routine with some delicious, and nutritious, Isopure protein recipes.
Dean begins by making his new favorite: Citrus Raspberry Protein Smoothie . This smoothie, made with Isopure Infusions in Citrus Lemonade , fresh orange juice, and lemon juice, is both nutritious and visually stunning with its vibrant color. The addition of fresh ingredients makes for a refreshing start to the day.
The adventure moves beyond the kitchen as Dean heads to Kelton, Connecticut, where he meets up with friends for some bouldering. He emphasizes that true wellness includes staying active and fostering meaningful social connection, demonstrating that it’s not only about what you consume but who you surround yourself with .
After some fun in the sun, Dean prepares a quick Isopure Infusions shake , demonstrating how easy it is to incorporate these drinks into a busy lifestyle. His approach to wellness is all about making simple, smart choices that fit into everyday life.
Dean ends the day by reflecting on his approach to life, highlighting the importance of being intentional about wellness habits, staying active, and enjoying meaningful time with friends. It’s clear that for him, living a good life means making mindful choices and embracing a balanced lifestyle.
Stay tuned for more from Isopure’s “Shake Up Summer” series, and keep finding new ways to shake up your own wellness routine!
